alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued July 18 at 5:35PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR JAMAR ROSS, BLACK MALE, 1 YEAR OLD, 2 FEET 08 INCHES, 45 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR TARHONDIA JACKSON, 26 YEARS OLD, BLACK, FEMALE, 6 FEET 02 INCHES, 200 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN TYLER, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 0 3 5 3 1 1 0 0 0. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 0 3 5 2 6 9 3 1 0.
